text: Walter Romberg (27 December 1928 â€“ 23 May 2014) was a German politician. He was the last finance minister of East Germany. Romberg died from an illness in Munich, Germany, aged 85. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Government ministers of East Germany Category:Members of the Volkskammer Category:Politicians from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
